meanings.definition: A type of shirt with a collar and a few buttons at the neck.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new set of henleys for the summer.
meanings.sent2: She wore a comfortable henleys to the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The henleys looked like it was trying to button itself up!
meanings.sent4: His collection of henleys was a colorful array of choices.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the henleys felt like a gentle hug.

meanings.definition: A style of shirt with a round neck and buttons down the front.
meanings.sent1: The henleys he wore had a unique design on the buttons.
meanings.sent2: She prefers henleys over other types of shirts.
meanings.sent3: The henleys seemed to be smiling with its buttoned-up look.
meanings.sent4: The henleys was a gateway to his fashion sense.
meanings.sent5: The buttons on the henleys gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of shirt with long sleeves and a collar.
meanings.sent1: In the fall, he always wears his favorite henleys.
meanings.sent2: The henleys she chose was perfect for the chilly weather.
meanings.sent3: The henleys looked like a superhero cape with its long sleeves.
meanings.sent4: His henleys was his go-to outfit for casual Fridays.
meanings.sent5: The collar of the henleys added a touch of elegance to his look.
